metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9656 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in LibOFX 0.9.14. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function OFXApplication::startElement in the file lib/ofx_sgml.cpp, as demonstrated by ofxdump.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9656` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libofx7 - 1:0.9.15-2build1
ofx - 1:0.9.15-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libofx package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.15-2build1').
